show_shipping_address.label: Enable shipping to different address
show_shipping_address.comment: For Customers that have shipping address different from billing address

redirect_to_checkout.label: Redirect to checkout automatically after adding product to cart

hide_shipping_method.label: Hide section Shipping Method if only one method is applicable

allow_guest.label: Allow Guest Checkout
allow_guest.comment: if set to No, registration is required

address_configuration_separator.label: Sections updated when changing in Address

enable_ajax.label: Auto update Sections following changes in Address
enable_ajax.comment: Auto save address and update Sections

shipping_configuration_separator.label: Sections updated when changing in Shipping Method

payment_configuration_separator.label: Sections updated when changing in Payment Method

enable_custom_size.label: Enable custom size
enable_custom_size.comment: If enabled, allow adjusting the Terms and Conditions popup size.

term_width.label: Width
term_width.comment: Width(px) of Terms and and Conditions popup

term_height.label: Height
term_height.comment: Height(px) of Terms and and Conditions popup

giftwrap_type.label: Gift wrap type
giftwrap_type.comment: To calculate gift wrap fee based on item or order.

giftwrap_amount.label: Gift wrap fee
giftwrap_amount.comment: Enter the amount of gift wrap fee.

enable_survey_freetext.label: Enable "Other" value
enable_survey_freetext.comment: If enabled, users can type free text and "Other" label will be added to dropdown

survey_values.label: Values
survey_values.comment: Values entered here will appear as labels in feedback dropdown on checkout page
